definition: poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with

sentences.chinese: 方法採用減少賦形劑的方法。

sentences.english: Polyether is often used as pharmaceutical excipient and emulsifier because of its low toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 聚醚毒性很低，常用作藥物賦形劑和乳化劑。

sentences.english: The method was simple, stable and undisturbed with excipient.
sentences.chinese: 該法簡便，樣液穩定，賦形劑對測定無干擾。

sentences.english: Mannitol is usually used as a cryoprotectant and an excipient during pharmaceutical freeze-drying.
sentences.chinese: 甘露醇是藥品冷凍乾燥中常用的低溫保護劑和賦形劑。
